bayes

Interface BayesianNetwork

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BayesDyn, BayesStatic

    public interface BayesianNetwork
    Interface that represents a Bayesian Network. In a bayesian network we can learn the network, infer probabilities from the learned network and have a certain number of restarts to escape local maximums
    Author:
    Sofia Silva, Tiago Ricardo, Nuno Mendes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[][] getAllPredictions(int[][] testing)
      Infers the most probable value for a certain random variable considering a test set and the learned network
      int[] getPredictions(int var, int[][] testing)
      Infers the most probable value for a certain random variable considering a test set and the learned network
      void greedyHill()
      Computes a greedy hill climbing algorithm for a certain training set
      void setRestarts(int n)
      Updates the number of restarts to be made in the the GHC algorithm

    • Method Detail

      • greedyHill

        void greedyHill()
        Computes a greedy hill climbing algorithm for a certain training set

                     int[][] testing)
        Infers the most probable value for a certain random variable considering a test set and the learned network
        Parameters:
